title: Flag
description: textile has a black border and is decorated with designs of beads and sequins; images include flowers, a cross, a long teal snake, two figures facing the snake, as well as a figure with a sword in his chest; donor\'s inventory describes the flag as portraying a \"voodoo shrine\"; written in red beads and sequins along bottom is \"VALRIS\"
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
